title: Is PBE still accepting people or is it closed?
body: About 2 or 3 years ago, two of my friends got PBE when the sign-ups opened and they both got accepted into it. About 8 months ago, I decided to try and get it too. I have continuously requested over and over about every month during the 8 month time period, and I still have not been accepted. Are PBE sign-ups closed, or am I just really unlucky?

replies.body:
I am not able to submit a form, because the NA PBE application page says error. Am I too late, and is the page already shut down or can I still apply?

I really wanted to try out the new Vastaya champs.

PBE Signups are still open, as we send invites out in batches. Simply applying doesn't guarantee an invite, though, as we tend to invite players that meet the criteria for what we're testing at the time. You can find more about the PBE system and how we look at potential candidates in our [**PBE FAQ.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top)

If you have any questions that the FAQ was unable to answer, please let me know.
